Multimedia Player

Looking for WET v3.1?

WET v4.0 is now the current version. There is a new location for the current page in WET v3.1.

Questions or comments?

Purpose

Provides an accessible multimedia player for embedding video and audio into web pages.

Working example

  • English video example
  • French video example
  • English audio example
  • French audio example
  • English YouTube example
  • French YouTube example

How to implement

Coming soon

Configuration options

Coming soon

Events

Event Trigger What it does
wb-init.wb-mltmd Triggered manually (e.g., $elm.trigger( "wb-init.wb-mltmd" );). Used to manually initialize the multimedia player. Note: The multimedia player will be initialized automatically unless the multimedia player markup is added after the page has already loaded.

Source code

Multimedia player source code on GitHub
